attributes.action: make sure that all our armed forces get the compensation they deserve
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment any armed forces personnel injured in conflicts either physically or mentally ie PTSD (post traumatic stress disorder)are not entitled to any compensation if the injury happened before april 2005 surely this is wrong and i know from personnal experience it is causing a lot of hardship for these personnel and their families it is another example of the goverment brushing things under the carpet if they dont acknowledge the problem it does not exist this is very very wrong they have put themselves in the front line for our countries safety and they are just ignored this is very very wrong and should not be allowed to happen ever
